Articles.Content:
Many thanks to the developers that gave us this wonderful game, which besides being lots of fun also helped me to develop my interest and understanding of space exploration!

Thanks to the amazingly helpful and supportive community!

Having entered the Final Approach and looking forward to the next year that may bring us KSP2, I would like to wish you all Merry Christmas and sound health and lot of happiness throughout the Year 2022!

Fly safe and have fun!

And I would alos like to share with the picture that my daughter has drawn for me:

I love it... I will pass this on to the rest of the team. Thank you, and please thank your daughter!  
Happy Holidays!
